Question: Sba loan group CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SBA Loan Group

CES 2024

- SBA implemented policies to expand access to capital for small businesses by modernizing SBA’s signature 7(a) working capital and 504 fixed asset loan programs
- SBA will determine eligibility and check for fraud upfront, validating information through APIs connecting to private and governmental databases
- SBA removed the subjective “control” requirement on affiliation for all business loan programs, focusing instead on affiliation through ownership
- SBA Forms 1919 and 1244 are being updated to reflect changes in data collection for 7(a) and 504 loans
- SBA provides different underwriting options for 7(a) loans of $500,000 or less, allowing lenders to use their own policies and processes
- SBA provided additional flexibility in checking taxes for 7(a) loans under $500,000
- SBA is removing the Loan Authorization Wizard and will provide an electronically generated Terms and Conditions sheet using data already entered into ETRAN
Summary_cn:
SBA贷款集团

CES 2024

- SBA通过现代化SBA的7(a)工作资本贷款和504固定资产贷款计划，推行政策以扩大小企业获得资金的机会
- SBA将确定资格，并通过连接私人和政府数据库的API验证信息，以防止欺诈行为
- SBA取消了所有企业贷款计划中对“控制”要求的主观评估，而是将焦点放在所有权方面的关联上
- SBA正在更新1919和1244表格，以反映7(a)和504贷款的数据收集变化
- SBA为500,000美元或更低额度的7(a)贷款提供了不同的承保选择，使贷款人能够使用自己的政策和流程
- SBA对500,000美元以下的7(a)贷款的税收检查提供了更大的灵活性
- SBA正在移除贷款授权向导，并将使用已输入ETRAN的数据生成电子生成的条款和条件单
